WelcomePage.Title: Welcome to Knowte!
WelcomePage.Text: To begin using Knowte, please select a directory in which you want your notes to be saved. If you would like to import notes which you already have, just select the directory that has them and Knowte will import them for you.

AboutPage.IsKnowteUseful: Is Knowte useful? Please consider donating. Thank you!

SettingsPage.ShowExactDatesInTheNotesList: Show exact dates in the notes list
SettingsPage.UseCustomTitleBar: Use custom title bar (Requires a restart)
SettingsPage.MoveDeletedNotesToTrash: Move deleted notes to the trash instead of deleting them permanently.

DialogTexts.ConfirmDeleteCollection: Are you sure you want to delete the collection '{{collection}}'? If you continue, its notebooks and notes will be lost.
DialogTexts.ConfirmDeleteNote: Are you sure you want to delete the note '{{noteTitle}}'?
DialogTexts.ConfirmDeleteNotes: Are you sure you want to delete these notes?
DialogTexts.ConfirmPermanentlyDeleteNote: Are you sure you want to permanently delete the note '{{noteTitle}}'? It will be lost forever.
DialogTexts.ConfirmPermanentlyDeleteNotes: Are you sure you want to permanently delete these notes? They will be lost forever.
DialogTexts.ConfirmDeleteNotebook: Are you sure you want to delete the notebook '{{notebookName}}'? Its notes will not be deleted. They will just become unfiled.
DialogTexts.ConfirmDeleteNotebooks: Are you sure you want to delete these notebooks? Their notes will not be deleted. They will just become unfiled.
DialogTexts.SelectDirectoryContainingOldVersionExpor: Please select the directory containing the files which were exported from Knowte 1.x.
DialogTexts.ConfirmDecryptNote: Are you sure you want to decrypt this note?
DialogTexts.ConfirmCloseAllNotes: This will close all open notes. Are you sure you want to continue?
DialogTexts.ConfirmMoveNote: Are you sure you want to move this note to collection '{{collection}}'?
DialogTexts.ConfirmMoveNotes: Are you sure you want to move these notes to collection '{{collection}}'?

ErrorTexts.StorageDirectoryCreationError: The directory '{{storageDirectory}}' cannot be used to save your notes. You might not have sufficient permissions to create items in it. Please verify the log if you need more information.
ErrorTexts.GlobalError: An error has occurred which will cause the application to close. Please verify the log if you need more information.
ErrorTexts.AddCollectionError: An error occurred while adding the collection '{{collection}}'. Please verify the log if you need more information.
ErrorTexts.AddNotebookError: An error occurred while adding the notebook '{{notebookName}}'. Please verify the log if you need more information.
ErrorTexts.RenameNoteError: An error occurred while renaming the note '{{noteTitle}}'. Please verify the log if you need more information.
ErrorTexts.RenameNotebookError: An error occurred while renaming the notebook '{{notebookName}}'. Please verify the log if you need more information.
ErrorTexts.RenameCollectionError: An error occurred while renaming the collection '{{collection}}'. Please verify the log if you need more information.
ErrorTexts.DeleteCollectionError: An error occurred while deleting the collection '{{collection}}'. Please verify the log if you need more information.
ErrorTexts.DeleteNotebooksError: An error occurred while deleting the notebooks. Please verify the log if you need more information.
ErrorTexts.DeleteNotesError: An error occurred while deleting the notes. Please verify the log if you need more information.
ErrorTexts.RestoreNotesError: An error occurred while restoring the notes. Please verify the log if you need more information.
ErrorTexts.SaveNoteError: An error occurred while saving the note '{{noteTitle}}'. Please verify the log if you need more information.
ErrorTexts.UpdateNoteContentError: An error occurred while saving the note content. Please verify the log if you need more information.
ErrorTexts.GetNoteContentError: An error occurred while getting the note content. Please verify the log if you need more information.
ErrorTexts.ExportNoteError: An error occurred while exporting the note '{{noteTitle}}'. Please verify the log if you need more information.
ErrorTexts.ImportNotesError: An error occurred while importing notes. Please verify the log if you need more information.
ErrorTexts.ChangeNotebookError: An error occurred while changing the notebook. Please verify the log if you need more information.
ErrorTexts.MoveNotesError: An error occurred while moving notes to the collection '{{collection}}'. Please verify the log if you need more information.

SnackBarMessages.DuplicateCollection: There is already a collection with the name '{{collection}}'
SnackBarMessages.DuplicateNotebook: There is already a notebook with the name '{{notebookName}}'
SnackBarMessages.NoteTitleCannotBeEmpty: The note title cannot be empty
SnackBarMessages.NoNoteFilesToImport: There were no note files to import
